alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 7:02PM CDT until October 02 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southwestern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 601 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Wild Horse Butte to 7 miles southeast of Alliance Airport to 8 miles northeast of Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hay Springs, Ellsworth, Antioch, Deer Lake, Intersection of Beaver Creek Road and White Clay Creek Road, Britton Lake, Miles Lake, Wickson Lake, Diamond Lake, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, Herman Lake, Krause Lake, Watson Lake, Patterson Lake, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Walgren Lake State Recreation Area, and Snow Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 88. Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 27. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 128. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
